Hello insinuendo I beg you to upload Punk Love 2006 this is my last post about it, I was looking for it and could not find anywhere, any format thank you God bless you, you are doing god's work ;D

The first part has DTS audio which doesn't play on LG. Though i was able to convert it in AC3.
Thanks for the upload.
I will seed it for another week....

TO ALL LG 3D TV USERS!
DTS is NOT compatible if you plug your usb hdd directly on the TV, don't panic, just use this tool http://www.videohelp.com/tools/MKV2AC3 and it will remove the DTS from the movie!
I takes around 20 min to get the work done, but it does an amazing one! Good luck LG 3DTV users!
